library.name: Audio
library.description: Library for playing Sound effects and music in a Game instance.

class.name: Music
class.description: Represents a sound file that can be played as music. Only one music instance can be played simultaneously.

function.name: play
function.arg: True to make this song repeat after playback is finished.
function.description: Plays the song with no intro transition. Halts current music playback if it is playing.

function.name: fadeOutAndPlay
function.arg: True to make this song repeat after playback is finished.
Number of seconds to fade out the currently playing music if there is any.
function.description: Fades out the currently playing music if there is any and plays the given music instance.

function.name: fadeOut
function.arg: Number of seconds to fade out.
function.description: Fades out this song if it is currently playing. See also Music.fadeOutCurrent.

function.name: fadeOutAndIn
function.arg: True to make this song repeat after playback is finished.
Number of seconds to fade out the currently playing music if there is any.
Number of seconds to fade in the given music instance.
function.description: Fades out the current music if there is any and fades in the given music instance.

function.name: fadeOutCurrent
function.arg: Number of seconds to fade out.
function.description: Fades out the current music if there is any playing.

function.name: getCurrent
function.description: Returns the Music instance of the currently playing song, or null if there isn't one.

function.name: loadFromResource
function.arg: Resource path to an OGG file. Support for other formats may potentially work but is not guaranteed to be consistent between platforms.
function.description: Returns a new Music instance of the given resource.

class.name: Sound
class.description: Represents a sound playback object. Sound instances are created by SoundResource and are ephemeral, expiring after playback is over.

function.name: getState
function.description: Returns a SoundPlayState enum value indicating the current state of the sound.

function.name: resume
function.description: Resumes playback of the given sound.

function.name: stop
function.description: Stops the currently playing sound. Playback cannot be resumed. To pause playback, use pause().

function.name: pause
function.description: Pauses the currently playing sound. Playback can be resumed in the same position with resume().

function.name: getResource
function.description: Returns the SoundResource instance that corresponds to this sound.

function.name: getPan
function.description: Returns the pan value for this sound, which is a float between -1 and 1. -1 Corresponds to left, 1 corresponds to right, and 0 is centered (default).

function.name: setPan
function.arg: The pan value to set. Value must be float between -1 and 1. -1 corresponds to left, 1 corresponds to right, and 0 is centered.
function.description: Sets the pan value for this sound.

function.name: getVolume
function.description: Returns the volume ratio of this sound. This is a float between 0 (silent) and 1 (full volume).

function.name: setVolume
function.description: Sets the current volume of this sound (just for this playback). This is float between 0 (silent) and 1 (full volume). To set the default volume for all future Sound instances created from this SoundResource, invoke setDefaultVolume.

class.name: SoundResource
class.description: Represents a raw sound resource that can be played. Playing a sound resource creates a Sound instance which controls actual playback of the sound (pausing, resuming, fading, etc).

function.name: setDefaultVolume
function.arg: Volume value to set. This is a float between 0 (silent) and 1 (full volume).
function.description: Sets the default volume that Sound playback will start with. Individual playback instances can have volume set with Sound.setVolume.

function.name: getDefaultVolume
function.description: Gets the current default volume for this sound.

function.name: loadFromFile
function.arg: Path to a sound file on disk.
function.description: Creates a new SoundResource for an OGG file on disk.

function.name: loadFromResource
function.arg: Path to a sound file in the compiled resources.
Set to false to force creation of a new SoundResource. Otherwise a reference to a previously created instance will be returned.
function.description: Creates a new SoundResource for an OGG file in the compiled resources.

function.name: play
function.arg: Pan value between -1.0 and 1.0. -1 represents left, 1 represents right, and 0 is centered (default).
function.description: Plays the SoundResource instance, and creates a new Sound instance which represents the current playback session.
